Name: Chubmen's Strange Case File~Chapter Of Corridor~
About the game: FEATURE ★4 character to select ★10 difficulties to select ★Beautiful sticker style picture ★Interesting scene ★rich and sounds good BGM POSTSCRIPT This game is adapted from my comic. There is story mode, so don't worry about not looked the original comic. I wanted to make a networking game, however, the network technology is too hard so I deleted the network mode, instead, used local multiplay mode. Players can use STEAM's Remote Play Together or PARSEC or other third share screen platforms for online connection. It would be great if you play it with your friends.
